answers.author: William Brown
answers.text:
Jennifer, 
The City of Grand Rapids, Michigan is undergoing a city wide transformation effort. We have adopted a sustainability plan and are required to post quarterly updates on our progress. We have made great strides to become a competitive and sustainable organization and I think you'll find the information on our website of some value. 
http://beta.grcity.us/Pages/MyGRCity-Dashboard.aspx 
Good Luck!
Brad

author: Jennifer Inman
text: I'm looking for examples of Goal statements, adopted by elected councils or commissions, that capture the nature/spirit of large-scale transformational organizational change.  Can you share links to cities/counties with strategic plans that fit the bill?
title: Transformational Goals
